alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 4:06PM AKST until March 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY NORTH OF GAKONA... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with localized amounts up to 16 inches. * WHERE...Copper River Basin north of Gakona. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slippery roads and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will begin Wednesday morning and accumulation rates will gradually increase during the day near Paxson and Chistochina north. Snow will peak in intensity late Wednesday afternoon through Thursday, especially through Isabel Pass. Light and intermittent snow will continue through the day on Friday. If you must travel, plan extra time and carry an emergency kit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
